SCAMPCompile.commandLineArgs:
"pw macro ; word
 psh (($1 >> 12) & 15)
 nib (($1 >> 8) & 15)
 psh (($1 >> 4) & 15)
 nib ($1 & 15)
endm

pb macro ; byte
 psh (($1 >> 4) & 15)
 nib ($1 & 15)
endm

up macro
 psh (((($1 & 3) | ($2 << 2)) >> 4) & 15)
 nib (($1 & 3) | ($2 << 2) & 15)
 mov
endm

;BEGIN
 
 up dw, 1
 dup dw
 
 pb TIMESTAMP
 inp b, dw
 
 cmp dw
 skp
 bra timeout
 
 up b, 4
 ret
 
timeout
 pop dw
 pb TIMESTAMP
 inp b, dw
 psh 0
 psh 0
 pw DELAY
 add dw
 
 up b, 4
 psh 1
 xor b
 ret  " -dDELAY=10 -xdevice
